alert.note: Alert for Allamakee; Winneshiek (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 27 at 7:35PM CDT until August 27 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Allamakee County in northeastern Iowa... Eastern Winneshiek County in northeastern Iowa... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 735 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ossian, or 10 miles south of Decorah, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Decorah around 810 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Hanover, County Roads A 52 And W 60, State Road 9 And County X 20, State Road 76 And County X 16, Frankville, State Road 9 And Frankville Road and Nordness. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This thunderstorm is capable of producing all types of severe weather including extremely large hail, destructive straight line winds and tornadoes. Move quickly to a safe shelter such as an interior room, a bathroom, closet or basement.
